Updated Terms of Use. Please review them as these new Terms will apply to you if you continue to use this game after October 26, 2017, the date is the date that is 2 weeks after the date that the revised Terms of Use have been posted. Among the changes are: a revised dispute resolution process, certain terms required by Apple, a process for submitting notices of copyright infringement; and details about subscriptions.

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

Added support for the iPhone X
